Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

CXLLogicalDevice.description: The schema definition for the CXLLogicalDevice resource.  It represents the properties of a CXL logical device within PCIe device.
CXLLogicalDevice.longDescription: This resource shall represent a CXL logical device that is a part of PCIe device.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Identifiers.description: The durable names for the CXL logical device.
Identifiers.longDescription: This property shall contain a list of all known durable names for the associated CXL logical device.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This property shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

Log.description: The link to the log service associated with this CXL logical device.
Log.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource of type LogService.

MemorySizeMiB.description: The memory region size defined in this CXL logical device.
MemorySizeMiB.longDescription: This property shall contain the memory region size defined in this CXL logical device in mebibytes (MiB).

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

QoS.description: The quality of service configuration for this CXL logical device.
QoS.longDescription: This property shall contain the quality of service configuration for this CXL logical device.

QoSTelemetryCapabilities.description: The quality of service telemetry capabilities for this CXL logical device.
QoSTelemetryCapabilities.longDescription: This property shall contain the quality of service telemetry capabilities for this CXL logical device.

SemanticsSupported.description: The semantics supported by this CXL logical device.
SemanticsSupported.longDescription: This property shall contain the CXL Specification-defined semantics that are supported by this CXL logical device.

Status.description: The status and health of the resource and its subordinate or dependent resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

enumLongDescriptions.CXLcache: This value shall indicate the device conforms with the CXL Specification-defined 'CXL.cache' semantic.
enumLongDescriptions.CXLio: This value shall indicate the device conforms with the CXL Specification-defined 'CXL.io' semantic.
enumLongDescriptions.CXLmem: This value shall indicate the device conforms with the CXL Specification-defined 'CXL.mem' semantic.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This Redfish Specification-described type shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Endpoints.description: An array of links to the endpoints associated with this CXL logical device.
Endpoints.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources of type Endpoint that represent the endpoints associated with this CXL logical device.

MemoryChunks.description: An array of links to the memory chunks owned by this CXL logical device.
MemoryChunks.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources of type MmeoryChunks that represent the memory chunks owned by this CXL logical device.

MemoryDomains.description: An array of links to the memory domains associated with this CXL logical device.
MemoryDomains.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources of type MemoryDomain that represent the memory domains associated with this CXL logical device.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PCIeFunctions.description: An array of links to the PCIe functions assigned to this CXL logical device.
PCIeFunctions.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources of type PCIeFunction that represent the PCIe function assigned to this CXL logical device.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

QoS.description: The quality of service properties for this CXL logical device.
QoS.longDescription: This type shall contain the quality of service properties of this CXL logical device.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AllocatedBandwidth.description: The bandwidth allocated for this CXL logical device in multiples of 256.
AllocatedBandwidth.longDescription: This property shall contain the bandwidth allocated for this CXL logical device in multiples of 256.

LimitPercent.description: The bandwidth limit to this CXL logical device as a percentage.
LimitPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain the bandwidth limit for this CXL logical device as a percentage.

QoSTelemetryCapabilities.description: The quality of service telemetry capabilities for a CXL logical device.
QoSTelemetryCapabilities.longDescription: This type shall contain the quality of service telemetry capabilities for a CXL logical device.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

EgressPortBackpressureSupported.description: Indicates whether the device supports the CXL Specification-defined 'Egress Port Backpressure' mechanism.
EgressPortBackpressureSupported.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether the device supports the CXL Specification-defined 'Egress Port Backpressure' mechanism.

TemporaryThroughputReductionSupported.description: Indicates whether the device supports the CXL Specification-defined 'Temporary Throughput Reduction' mechanism.
TemporaryThroughputReductionSupported.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether the device supports the CXL Specification-defined 'Temporary Throughput Reduction' mechanism.

title: #CXLLogicalDevice.v1_0_0.CXLLogicalDevice
